quest_givers.name: Dusk
quest_givers.description: A male noivern that is an adventurer of the guild and shop owner of a map shop

quest_givers.name: Hardy
quest_givers.description: A male Klinklang and old adventurer and accountant from the past days, now a manufacturing lead of the factory that makes Z-Crystals.

quest_givers.name: Amaterasu
quest_givers.description: Amaterasu is the past guildmaster that sends quests from a strange time paradox to the guild like it is today. He doesnt know that they are in the past but he thinks that the group is actually in his timeline of the citadel. His quests are always something that the citadel went through in the past. Thats also how the group experiences the story how the citadel was created and why it became how it is today.

quest_givers.name: The Administrator
quest_givers.role: Server Administrator of the Citadel and the one who is posting the most "general" quests
quest_givers.description: A male Porygon-Z with a strange love to Computers and Server. In charge of the technical things of the citadel and basically acts like the "Head" of the Citadel in the time where there is no official Guildmaster.
